title: John Mayer - Paradise Valley
content:
Alright, I feel really silly asking this because I know I \*should\* know this.

It looks like Didot to me, but all the variants of Didot I have aren't wide/heavy enough...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064925im_/http:/typophile.com/files/954867_10151686223176252_1578322741_n_3723.jpg)

A few more examples:
